au.com.cybersearch2.classyfts

Class SearchEngineBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.com.cybersearch2.classyfts.SearchEngineBase

  • public abstract class SearchEngineBase
extends Object
    SearchEngineBase Abstract class implementing a search suggestion dictionary. Sub-class to override onCreate() and make a concrete class.
    Author:
    Andrew Bowley 12/07/2014

      Android Application Context

      Android Application Locale

      Flag to indicate FTS is supported and available
      static String LEX
      Keyword in search URI indicates use FTS for search suggestions
      protected static int LEXICAL_REFRESH_SHORTCUT
      UriMatcher ID for when using SearchManager.SUGGEST_COLUMN_SHORTCUT_ID as a column in our dictionary table
      protected static int LEXICAL_SEARCH_SUGGEST
      UriMatcher ID for Fast text search
      protected static int PROVIDER_TYPE
      UriMatcher ID for content provider query

      UriMatcher ID for when using SearchManager.SUGGEST_COLUMN_SHORTCUT_ID as a column in our suggestions table
      protected static int SEARCH_SUGGEST
      UriMatcher ID for Slow text search - for backup only
      static String TAG

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        public abstract void onCreate(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper sqLiteOpenHelper)
        Handle dictionary creation event
        Parameters:
        sqLiteOpenHelper - The open helper for the source database which is to be accessed using FTS

      • getType

        public String getType(int queryType,
             android.net.Uri uri)
        Returns MIME type for suggestions data
        Parameters:
        queryType - UriMatcher value
        uri - URI matched by UriMatcher
        Returns:
        "vnd.android.cursor.dir/vnd.android.search.suggest"
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if UriMatcher value does not match one for a suggestion type URI

      • query

        protected android.database.Cursor query(FtsQueryBuilder qb,
                            android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper sqLiteOpenHelper)
        Perform a search suggestion query using FTS if supported and available
        Parameters:
        qb - Populated QueryBuilder object
        sqLiteOpenHelper - Open helper for dictionary database
        Returns:
        A cursor over the result set

      • notifyChange

        protected void notifyChange(android.net.Uri uri)
        Notify registered observers that a row was updated and attempt to sync changes to the network.
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri of the content that was changed.
